review: All the reviewers that rate the Firetv  or FireTv Stick below 5 stars don't or can't understand the full potential these Amazon android based streaming devices are capable of.  Apple TV, Roku or Chromecast and others lack the ability to add XBMC/KODI on them.  If your not sure what I'm talking about, take the time and learn how to add KODI/XBMC on Firetv/Stick. You will be very pleased you bought these boxes.Go to YouTube and find out all you need to know about KODI on FireTv..
